name: Potion Panik
storyline: You're the owner of a potion shop in a small European-ish fantasy town. You dumped your ex one year ago, and you are finally, finally over him. That is, until you take a swig of a love potion. Right in front of him. The only cure? Fall in love with someone for real! But is that even possible when every cell in your body is screaming at you to sell your soul to someone else?
